title: The M in MVC
text: It's a me, Mario! Oh no, wait, it's actually Model! The model manages data for the application.

title: The V in MVC
text: V is for view, the aspect of the application which decides what the user will see on the screen. Essentially, this is the front end of the application.

title: The C in MVC
text: Last is definitely not least! C is for controller, and it's the brains of the operation! Controllers get, set and update data to provide to the user.

title: I told you so
text: I said putting Donkey Kong in a coding class wouldn't work, but noooo

title: I'm very confused
text: Why are all these characters on a tech blog? They belong in their games!
